articles.title: Boston has go-ahead basket with 7.4 seconds left as Fever beat Dream 87-85 to reach WNBA semifinals - AP News
articles.description: Aliyah Boston made the go-ahead basket with 7.4 seconds left, Lexie Hull stole the ensuing inbounds play and the Indiana Fever beat the Atlanta Dream 87-85 to advance to the WNBA semifinals. Despite missing Caitlin Clark among its injured players, Indiana clo…
articles.content: COLLEGE PARK, Ga. (AP) Aliyah Boston made the go-ahead basket with 7.4 seconds left, Lexie Hull stole the ensuing inbounds pass and the Indiana Fever beat the No. 3-seeded Atlanta Dream 87-85 on Thur… [+1582 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Colon cancer: THIS common over-the-counter medication slashes risk of colorectal cancer recurrence in hal - Times of India
articles.description: A groundbreaking study reveals that a daily low dose of aspirin can significantly reduce the risk of colorectal cancer recurrence by approximately 55%
